name: Rogue Night v0.2.2a - alpha test
description:
Rogue Night is a survival/building rogue like game set in a fantasy world that has been taken over by the evil lich Necrosarian the Vile.  Build, gather, rescue NPCs, and collect zombie heads for upgrades, while working your way towards Necrosarian.

Rogue Night is currently in alpha testing. The game is not complete, and there may be bugs. Please join the discord if you're interested in becoming a tester, and hunting down bugs!
